about

I am a fourth year student pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at California State University, Sacramento. My areas of focus include web application development, system programming and object oriented programming. I like to spend my time learning and working on cool project and tinkering with code and electronics. This site contains my projects and resume, It is also my lightweight blog. Take a look at my resume, or get in touch.
